text: "Pictures of You" is a song by American rock band The Last Goodnight. It was released in June 2007 as the first single from their debut album Poison Kiss. ==Track listings== *CD #"Pictures of You" #"Get Closer" ==Music video== "Pictures of You" was supported in a promo video directed by Marc Klasfeld. The video plays upon the song's title, mixing in various "pictures" to create the images and scenes which comprise the video. The same music video was being used by ABC Television and the Seven Network to promote the second season of Brothers & Sisters, but with scenes from the show mixed in. ==Charts== ===Weekly charts=== {| class="wikitable sortable" !align="center"|Chart (2007−09) !align="center"|Peak position |- |- |- |align="left"|Canada (Canadian Hot 100) |align="center"|32 |- |align="left"|Czech Republic (IFPI) |align="center"|2 |- |align="left"|Europe (Eurochart Hot 100) |align="center"|22 |- |- |align="left"|Italy (FIMI) |align="center"|7 |- |Poland (Airplay Chart) | style="text-align:center;"|4 |- |- |- |align="left"|U.S. Billboard Hot 100 |align="center"|70 |- |align="left"|U.S. Billboard Hot Adult Top 40 Tracks |align="center"|9 |- |align="left"|U.S. Billboard Pop 100 |align="center"|53 |- |align="left"|U.S. Billboard Top 40 Mainstream |align="center"|29 |- |} {|class="wikitable sortable" !Chart (2016) !Peak position |- |} ===Year-end charts=== {|class="wikitable sortable" !Chart (2008) !Position |- |Australia (ARIA) | style="text-align:center;"|18 |- |US Adult Top 40 (Billboard) | style="text-align:center;"|38 |} {|class="wikitable" !Chart (2009) !Position |- |Germany (Official German Charts) | style="text-align:center;"|98 |} ==References== ==External links== * Category:2007 songs Category:2007 debut singles Category:The Last Goodnight songs Category:Music videos directed by Marc Klasfeld Category:Songs written by Jeff Blue Category:Virgin Records singles
